duration_in_months: You will have to obtain more information to sadly automate
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Halfix Class - Electrocatalyst Cell

#### Announcement Details
* Solicitation Number: W8482-252933/A
* Tender Closing Date: December 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Viewing Opportunities: None
* Tender Description: [Download Tender Description](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51571/w8482-252933---acan---en_0.pdf)

The Department of National Defence is issuing a tender for the procurement of electrocatalyst cells to support water treatment and supply equipment at CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia, and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. The required items include:

* 18 electrocatalyst cells (Item 1) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* 12 electrocatalyst cells (Item 2) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Tender Information

* Tender Reference Number: cb-233-7838542
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: November 20, 2024
* Tender Status: Open
* Method of Procurement: Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: National Defence
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Christopher Cauchi
	+ Email: christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (555) 555-5555

#### Regions of Opportunity

* The opportunity is open to the world.
* The delivery of goods is expected to take place in British Columbia and Nova Scotia.

#### Regions of Delivery

* British Columbia
* Nova Scotia

#### Attachments

* Tender Description: [Download Tender Description](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51571/w8482-252933---acan---en_0.pdf)
* Tender Notice: [Download Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51571/w8482-252933---acan---fr_0.pdf) (French) Notes:
* This tender announcement is in English and French.
* Interested suppliers can view the tender description and other related documents on the buyandsell.gc.ca website.
* Please note the timeframe for submitting your tender is December 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late
